name: Wilt Chamberlain
description: 7'1" center, most dominant individual ever. 100 points in a game, 50 ppg season, 55 rebounds in a game. The records seem fictional.

100-point-game.name: 100 Point Game
100-point-game.description: Holding up paper showing '100' after historic game
100-point-game.prompt: holding up piece of paper showing '100' - seated in locker room, slight smile of satisfaction, after scoring 100 points in a single game, a feat that will never be repeated

finger-roll.name: Finger Roll
finger-roll.description: Signature soft finger roll over defenders
finger-roll.prompt: executing delicate finger roll at the rim - massive frame but soft touch, ball rolling off fingertips into basket, giant capable of surprising gentleness, unstoppable close-range

blocking-shot.name: Goaltending Height
blocking-shot.description: Blocking shot at a height that seems impossible
blocking-shot.prompt: blocking shot well above the rim - arm extended to impossible height, plucking ball from its downward arc, changing the rules of basketball, the reason goaltending exists

rebounding-above-all.name: 55 Rebounds
rebounding-above-all.description: Grabbing rebound above a crowd of players
rebounding-above-all.prompt: grabbing rebound high above multiple opposing players - arms fully extended, ball secured, multiple smaller players below reaching helplessly, 55 rebounds in a game

fadeaway-finger-point.name: Pointing After Score
fadeaway-finger-point.description: Pointing at defender after scoring easily
fadeaway-finger-point.prompt: pointing at defender after easy basket - slight smile, playful confidence, 'you can't stop me' gesture, making domination look fun

muscular-pose.name: Physical Specimen
muscular-pose.prompt: standing showing incredible muscular physique - massive shoulders, arms, and frame, the physical specimen that track and field and basketball shared, pure athletic dominance
